Class TCPAddress

java.lang.Object
  org.princehouse.mica.base.net.tcpip.TCPAddress
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Address>, Address
public class TCPAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements Address, java.io.Externalizable

TCP/IP Address implementation. See TCPAddress.valueOf to create a TCPAddress from a "host:port" string

Author:
lonnie
